articles.author: Paul McLeary, Jack Detsch
articles.title: Allies worry US demands Ukraine deal before security guarantees - Politico
articles.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio told European allies that President Donald Trump will negotiate long-term assurances for Ukraine’s safety.
articles.content: The situation is changing rapidly and European allies are scrambling to understand the multiple messages from the administration. Rubio also told European allies that security guarantees for Ukraine … [+3618 chars]
